pli-tv-bu-vb-sk36:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk36:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū sūpampi byañjanampi odanena paṭicchādenti bhiyyokamyataṃ upādāya …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk36:7.2: “Na sūpaṃ vā byañjanaṃ vā odanena paṭicchādessāmi bhiyyokamyataṃ upādāyāti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk36:8.1: Na sūpaṃ vā byañjanaṃ vā odanena paṭicchādetabbaṃ bhiyyokamyataṃ upādāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk36:8.2: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca sūpaṃ vā byañjanaṃ vā odanena paṭicchādeti bhiyyokamyataṃ upādāya, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
